inclusion.criterion: HCC underwent curative resection within 6 weeks before registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Grossly, the resection margin should be > 1 cm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumors, either single, < 5 cm in size or no more than 3 for size < 3 cm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a performance status of ECOG score < 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate liver reservation and adequate hemogram
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The serum total bilirubin level are < 2 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The prothrombin times are < 3 sec above normal control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must have serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dl
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have non-curative resection are not eligible
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Resected HCCs with histologically positive margins are not eligible
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: HCCs with radiological evidence of portal vein thrombus are not eligible
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 55 year old man visiting his primary care physician for lower urinary tract symptoms. He has IPSS score : 15, Post-void residual: 70 mL and Prostate volume (TRUS): 60 mL.
